title: Sion, The Hyper Hyper Hyper Hyper...
body:
... carry.

http://i.imgur.com/vpnLeBc.jpg?1

Man I love bots.

{{champion:14}} NOOOOTHHIIING, CAN STOP MEEEEEEE!!!

replies.body: I've gone Ashe 1v5..... gotten a penta and solo'd baron.....

But did you have 5k hp?

P.S. Someone should make a thread dedicated to outrageous stats on various champions.
